summary: A video where Kaitlin shares a variety of revision tips to help viewers prepare for exams, sponsored by Pentel.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair wearing a blue sleeveless top, seated in a well-lit room with a white desk behind her. The desk is adorned with various items, including a clear organizer filled with makeup products, a small potted plant, and a container holding makeup brushes. The woman appears to be speaking directly to the camera, using hand gestures to emphasize her points. At one point, text appears on the screen, displaying social media handles: "@KAITLINEMMAX" and "@KAITLINDOBSON," accompanied by the Snapchat logo. The video transitions to a close-up shot of a collection of colorful pens and business cards, with one card prominently displaying the word "SEGMENTATION" and a pizza graphic. The woman continues to speak, occasionally giving a thumbs-up gesture, indicating approval or satisfaction. The overall atmosphere is casual and engaging, with the woman likely discussing topics related to makeup, business, or personal branding.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with an upbeat introduction from a female speaker welcoming viewers back to her channel, mentioning her name as "Caitlyn." She informs the audience that she will be making a second revision video, providing advice and revision techniques. She mentions the previous video she made. She excitedly announces this video is in collaboration with "Pentel," a stationary brand that is sponsoring the video, and encourages viewers to check out their products. The female speaker mentions that she will leave a link to their website and socials below. The audio then transitions to the background with a swishing sound effect, before resuming with the female speaker stating that she is "going to get into my part two revision video". She ends off by asking that the viewers enjoy, give the video a thumbs up, and to subscribe if new to the channel.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair wearing a blue sleeveless top, seated at a white desk in a well-lit room. She is engaged in a conversation or presentation, using expressive hand gestures to emphasize her points. The desk is organized with various items, including a clear organizer filled with lipsticks, a brown candle, a small bottle, a black container holding makeup brushes, and a white potted plant. A white notebook and a decorative letter 'K' are also visible on the desk. The background includes a white wall with a yellow sticky note and a piece of paper pinned to it. The woman's gestures and facial expressions suggest she is explaining or discussing something with enthusiasm. The video maintains a consistent setting and atmosphere throughout, focusing on the woman's interaction with the camera and the items on her desk.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a female speaker introducing her first tip, suggesting "to find a place that you want to do your revision in," maintaining consistency in the chosen spot. She highlights that doing so "helps with your general mindset," adding that she likes to study in a cafe. This speaking portion transitions to a sound effect, followed again by a female speaker who moves on to her next tip, which is "to take pride in your notes and make them beautiful."

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair, wearing a blue sleeveless top, seated at a white desk adorned with various items such as a clear organizer filled with lipsticks, a red candle, a small potted plant, and a container holding makeup brushes. She appears to be engaged in a discussion or presentation, as indicated by her hand gestures and facial expressions. The scene transitions to a close-up of a notebook page with the words "ESSAY PLANS" written in colorful, wavy lines, suggesting a creative approach to planning. The woman is then shown writing in a notebook with a pen, surrounded by an array of colorful pens and markers, indicating a focus on organization and planning. The video continues with a close-up of her hand writing on lined paper, with the text "Planning Essentials" visible, followed by a detailed list of points such as "Customer (needs/wants)," "Brand value," and "Design a customer green strategy." The woman's hand is seen drawing a pink brain and a blue speech bubble, adding a visual element to her notes. The video concludes with the woman speaking directly to the camera, maintaining a consistent background of the white desk and its items, creating a cohesive and focused atmosphere centered around planning and organization.
events_list.audio_caption: A young, enthusiastic female speaker mentions having separate notebooks for each subject, containing title pages organized into lecture slides, tutorial questions, and exam questions, to help keep everything organized, particularly when stuck. She then highlights her favorite Pentel EnerGel pens which she uses throughout the year because they dry fast, useful because she's left-handed and smears her notes. She adds that they are comfortable to use and the ink is of high quality. Finally, a sound similar to scratching a chalkboard is heard.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair, wearing a blue sleeveless top, seated in a well-lit room with a white desk behind her. The desk is adorned with various items, including a clear organizer filled with lipsticks, a red candle, a small bottle, a potted plant, and a container holding makeup brushes. The woman is actively engaged in a conversation or presentation, using expressive hand gestures to emphasize her points. Her nails are painted a bright orange color, adding a pop of color to her appearance. The background includes a white wall with a piece of paper and a yellow sticky note attached to it, suggesting a casual and creative workspace. The video transitions to a close-up of a notebook page, displaying handwritten notes and colorful drawings. The notes are titled 'Understanding Consumer Needs' and 'Influences,' with bullet points under each heading. The 'Influences' section is divided into 'Personal,' 'Psychological,' and 'Social' categories, each with sub-points such as 'demographic,' 'personality,' 'reference groups,' and 'social class.' The drawings include a person, a brain, and speech bubbles, visually representing the concepts discussed. The video then returns to the woman, who continues her presentation, maintaining her engaging demeanor and expressive gestures. The overall atmosphere is one of a dynamic and informative discussion, likely related to consumer behavior or marketing, set in a personal and creative environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a female speaker introducing the topic of whether one is a "mind map person" or a "bullet point person," mentioning a friend who uses mind maps for essay plans but finding them messy. She then describes her preference for bullet point essay plans, with titles for paragraphs and bullet points for key points. She suggests bullet points for those who never look at their mind maps, implying it might be more enjoyable.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair, wearing a blue sleeveless top, seated at a white desk in a well-lit room. She is surrounded by various items, including a clear organizer filled with makeup products, a red candle, a small potted plant, and a container holding makeup brushes. The woman appears to be speaking and gesturing with her hands, which have bright pink nail polish. Behind her, a white wall displays a piece of paper with handwritten notes and a yellow sticky note. The video begins with a close-up of a handwritten note on lined paper, detailing points about consumer behavior, such as understanding how people make choices, what influences their purchase, and the process of consumption. The note also includes a section titled 'Influences,' which is divided into three categories: Personal, Psychological, and Social, each with bullet points listing factors like demographic, personality, roles, and culture. The video then transitions to the woman at the desk, who continues to speak and gesture, likely elaborating on the points mentioned in the note. The setting remains consistent throughout, with the woman maintaining a focused and engaged demeanor as she discusses the topic.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a female speaker describing the variety of colors available in a pen range, noting how they can be used for decoration, and how users can “go as crazy as you want with color.” This is followed by a sound of quick scribbling on paper. Next, another female speaker recommends finding a revision TV show as an incentive during exams, suggesting something light-hearted like a rom-com to avoid affecting your mood. She says to watch one episode in the morning, one during lunch, and one in the evening as a reward, saying it keeps exam time from being too stressful because you have things to look forward to.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair wearing a blue sleeveless top, seated at a white desk in a well-lit room. She is surrounded by various items, including a clear organizer filled with lipsticks, a red candle, a small potted plant, and a container holding makeup brushes. The woman appears to be speaking, as indicated by her hand gestures and facial expressions. The camera then zooms in on a piece of paper with the word "SEGMENTATION" written on it, accompanied by a drawing of a pizza slice and a pie chart, suggesting a discussion on market segmentation. The scene returns to the woman, who continues to speak, occasionally touching her hair or gesturing with her hands. The background remains consistent throughout, with the desk items and a white wall adorned with a yellow sticky note and a piece of paper. The video maintains a professional and organized atmosphere, focusing on the woman's presentation and the visual aids used to support her discussion.
events_list.audio_caption: A female speaker discusses her study habits, specifically flashcards, in a casual, conversational tone. Then the sound of rustling paper is heard. The speaker continues, recommending planning something to look forward to after exams to give one hope. At the very end there is a short sound effect.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair wearing a blue sleeveless top, seated in a well-lit room with a white desk behind her. The desk is adorned with various items, including a clear organizer filled with makeup products, a red candle, a small potted plant, and a container holding makeup brushes. The woman appears to be speaking, as her mouth moves and her facial expressions change throughout the video. She uses hand gestures to emphasize her points, with her hands raised and fingers spread at times. The background includes a white wall with a piece of paper pinned to it, possibly containing notes or a list. The overall atmosphere is casual and focused on the woman's presentation, likely related to beauty or makeup, given the context of the items on the desk.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a single female speaker giving advice, urging listeners to "delete social media if necessary" if they feel easily distracted. She speaks in a casual, conversational tone, recounting her personal experience of deleting Instagram during exam time because it was "making me feel really, really bad about myself." She concludes that it's surprisingly easy to adapt to not using social media and suggests doing so "just for exam time." Shortly after, the sound of writing on a chalkboard is audible.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long, wavy blonde hair wearing a blue sleeveless top, seated in a well-lit room with a white desk behind her. The desk is adorned with various items, including a clear organizer filled with lipsticks, a red candle, a small bottle, a container holding makeup brushes, and a potted plant. The woman appears to be speaking, as her mouth moves and her facial expressions change throughout the video. She occasionally gestures with her hands, which have bright orange-painted nails. The background includes a white wall with a piece of paper and a sticky note attached to it. The overall atmosphere is casual and focused on the woman's presentation, likely related to beauty or makeup, given the context of the items on the desk.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features a single speaker with a lively tone, providing a tip about revising with a friend, emphasizing that "you don't really want to start" alone and the benefit of tackling issues together. They add that "you can kind of just mix your knowledge together and before you know it, you'll know everything." The speech concludes with the sound of the speaker exhaling.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair wearing a blue top, standing in front of a white desk adorned with various makeup items, including lipsticks, brushes, and a small potted plant. She appears to be speaking and gesturing with her hands, which have bright red nail polish. The background includes a white wall with a piece of paper and a sticky note attached to it. The scene transitions to a pink screen displaying the text "Tip Number... 9" in white and gray letters, indicating that the video is part of a series of tips or advice. The overall atmosphere is casual and informative, with a focus on beauty or makeup-related content.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a female speaker, who says "I also find when I hear it from somebody else and when somebody is verbalizing something to me, I learn it a lot better than if I was gonna read it from a textbook." Her tone suggests a casual conversation. Following this, there is a brief scrubbing sound, and then the same female speaker says "is I".

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair wearing a blue sleeveless top, seated at a white desk in a well-lit room. She is surrounded by various items, including a clear organizer filled with makeup products, a red candle, a small potted plant, and a container holding makeup brushes. The woman appears to be speaking and gesturing with her hands, indicating she is engaged in a conversation or presentation. The background includes a white wall with a yellow sticky note and a piece of paper pinned to it. The scene transitions to a close-up of a handwritten to-do list on a whiteboard, detailing tasks related to accounting and marketing, such as 'Accounting for 1-6 lectures & textbooks' and 'Marketing essay plans (basic).' The video then shifts to a person writing on a piece of paper with a pen, surrounded by a collection of colorful pens on the desk. The person is focused on their task, with their hand resting on the desk. The final scene shows a close-up of a notebook with handwritten notes organized by days of the week, including tasks like 'Accounting week 1' and 'Entrepreneurship flashcards.' The video captures a blend of personal and professional activities, emphasizing organization and productivity.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a single female speaker, who explains that she does not make study plans, instead preferring lists. She states that she enjoys ticking off and scoring things out to feel productive. She also mentions she dislikes time tables, so instead she makes lists of what she wants to achieve for her whole revision time, then the week, and finally the day. She creates each list right before it is needed. The female speaker speaks in a conversational and enthusiastic tone.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair wearing a blue sleeveless top, standing in front of a white desk adorned with various items such as a clear organizer filled with lipsticks, a red candle, a small plant, and makeup brushes. She appears to be speaking and gesturing with her hands, which have pink nail polish. The background includes a white wall with a yellow sticky note and a piece of paper pinned to it. The scene transitions to a pink screen displaying the text "Tip Number 10" in white cursive and bold font, indicating that the video is part of a series of tips. The woman continues to speak, maintaining the same setting and attire, suggesting that she is providing advice or information related to the tip being presented.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a female speaker discussing organizational and planning strategies, referring to what works best for her, in an informative tone. A faint scratching sound is heard. The speaker then continues with a tip, advising not to become "a study poo".

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair, wearing a blue sleeveless top, seated at a white desk in a well-lit room. She is surrounded by various items, including a clear organizer filled with makeup products, a red candle, a small potted plant, and a container holding makeup brushes. The woman appears to be speaking and gesturing with her hands, indicating she is engaged in a conversation or presentation. The background includes a white wall with a piece of paper pinned to it, adding to the organized and tidy atmosphere of the setting. The video transitions to a close-up of a notebook with handwritten notes and diagrams, suggesting a focus on academic or professional content. The woman continues to speak and gesture, emphasizing her points with hand movements. The video concludes with a screen displaying the text "Kaitlin Emma" along with social media handles and links to her last video and vlog channel, indicating her online presence and encouraging viewers to follow her on various platforms.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a female speaker strongly advising against a specific study habit, emphasizing the importance of self-care for overall productivity and well-being. She advocates for a balanced approach, warning against feeling “minging” and “rubbish” from constant revision. She concludes her discussion of revision techniques and mentions that she hopes the video has been helpful and plugging a product. The clip concludes with background music transitioning into a pop song.
